statements: SELECT * FROM research_training WHERE training_completed = TRUE;
SELECT researcher_name, training_score FROM research_training WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_training WHERE training_score > 80;
SELECT researcher_name, training_score FROM research_training WHERE training_completed = FALSE;
SELECT researcher_name, training_score FROM research_training ORDER BY training_score DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM research_training WHERE training_completed = true ORDER BY researcher_name ASC
SELECT researcher_name, training_score FROM research_training WHERE training_score > 80 ORDER BY training_score DESC
SELECT * FROM research_training WHERE training_completed = false LIMIT 10
SELECT researcher_name, training_score FROM research_training WHERE training_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY training_score DESC, researcher_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_id FROM research_training WHERE training_completed = true ORDER BY researcher_id ASC
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, department FROM researchers WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_researchers FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM training_courses ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM training_courses WHERE completion_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE department='Engineering' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM researchers WHERE completion_status=TRUE;
SELECT * FROM training_courses WHERE completion_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM training_courses ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT researcher_id, name, department FROM researchers WHERE completion_status=FALSE ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ethics_compliance_officers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM researchers;
SELECT name, department FROM researchers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, completion_date FROM training_completion ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM ethics_compliance_officers;
SELECT name, email FROM ethics_compliance_officers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM researchers WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT id, name, email FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT researcher_id, completion_date, status FROM training_completion WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT module_name FROM training_modules ORDER BY module_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_completion WHERE completion_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM compliance_officers WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE department='Physics';

SELECT researchers.name, training_modules.module_name FROM researchers INNER JOIN training_completion ON researchers.researcher_id = training_completion.researcher_id INNER JOIN training_modules ON training_completion.module_id = training_modules.module_id;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM researchers ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM training_courses WHERE course_id <= 3;
SELECT * FROM researcher_training WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT researcher_id, course_id, progress_percentage FROM training_progress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM ethics_compliance_officers;
SELECT officer_name, officer_email FROM ethics_compliance_officers ORDER BY officer_name DESC;

SELECT researcher_name, course_name, completion_date FROM researchers JOIN researcher_training ON researchers.researcher_id = researcher_training.researcher_id JOIN training_courses ON researcher_training.course_id = training_courses.course_id;

SELECT officer_name, COUNT(researcher_id) AS total_researchers FROM ethics_compliance_officers JOIN researchers ON ethics_compliance_officers.officer_id = researchers.officer_id GROUP BY officer_name;
SELECT * FROM training_courses WHERE course_description LIKE '%research%';
